languages.text: "Оправдываются виновные, я же действовала на благо Империума. Как жаль, что не все можно исправить бюрократически, и порой упрямство и недальновидность служащих смежных инстанций..." {n}Старуха делает выразительную паузу. Брови маршала сдвигаются к переносице.{/n} "...становятся непреодолимой помехой".

traits.locale_text: "Оправдываются виновные, я же действовала на благо Империума. Как жаль, что не все можно исправить бюрократически, и порой упрямство и недальновидность служащих смежных инстанций..." {n}Старуха делает выразительную паузу. Кустистые брови маршала сдвигаются к переносице.{/n} "...Становятся непреодолимой помехой".
traits.speaker: VC_Prefect

traits.locale_text: "Оправдываются виновные, я же действовала на благо Империума. Как жаль, что не все можно исправить бюрократически, и порой упрямство и недальновидность служащих смежных инстанций..." {n}Старуха делает выразительную паузу. Брови маршала сдвигаются к переносице.{/n} "...становятся непреодолимой помехой".

languages.text: "Only the guilty try to defend themselves, whereas I acted in the interests of the Imperium. Such a shame that some things cannot be set right by bureaucratic means, and that the short-sightedness of certain people serving in adjacent divisions..." {n}She pauses meaningfully, watching the Marshal knit his brows.{/n} "...so often becomes an insurmountable obstacle."
languages.original_text: "Оправдываются виновные, я же действовала на благо Империума. Как жаль, что не все можно исправить бюрократически, и порой упрямство и недальновидность служащих смежных инстанций..." {n}Старуха делает выразительную паузу. Брови маршала сдвигаются к переносице.{/n} "...становятся непреодолимой помехой".

traits.locale_text: "Only the guilty try to defend themselves, whereas I acted in the interests of the Imperium. Such a shame that some things cannot be set right by bureaucratic means, and that the short-sightedness of certain people serving in adjacent divisions..." {n}She pauses meaningfully, watching the Marshal knit his brows.{/n} "...so often becomes an insurmountable obstacle."

"Only the guilty try to defend themselves, whereas I acted in the interests of the Imperium. Such a shame that some things cannot be set right by bureaucratic means, and that the short-sightedness of certain people serving in adjacent divisions..." {n}She pauses meaningfully, watching the Marshal knit his brows.{/n} "...so often becomes an insurmountable obstacle."

"Only the guilty try to defend themselves, whereas I acted in the interests of the Imperium. Such a shame that some things cannot be set right by bureaucratic means, and that the short-sightedness of certain people serving in adjacent divisions..." {n}She pauses meaningfully, watching the Marshal knit his brows.{/n} "...so often becomes an insurmountable obstacle."

"Only the guilty try to defend themselves, whereas I acted in the interests of the Imperium. Such a shame that some things cannot be set right by bureaucratic means, and that the short-sightedness of certain people serving in adjacent divisions..." {n}She pauses meaningfully, watching the Marshal knit his brows.{/n} "...so often becomes an insurmountable obstacle."

"Only the guilty try to defend themselves, whereas I acted in the interests of the Imperium. Such a shame that some things cannot be set right by bureaucratic means, and that the short-sightedness of certain people serving in adjacent divisions..." {n}She pauses meaningfully, watching the Marshal knit his brows.{/n} "...so often becomes an insurmountable obstacle."

"Only the guilty try to defend themselves, whereas I acted in the interests of the Imperium. Such a shame that some things cannot be set right by bureaucratic means, and that the short-sightedness of certain people serving in adjacent divisions..." {n}She pauses meaningfully, watching the Marshal knit his brows.{/n} "...so often becomes an insurmountable obstacle."

languages.text: "Nur die Schuldigen versuchen, sich zu verteidigen, während ich im Interesse des Imperiums gehandelt habe. Es ist ein Jammer, dass einige Dinge nicht mit bürokratischen Mitteln behoben werden können und dass die Kurzsichtigkeit gewisser Personen in anderen Abteilungen ..." {n}Sie macht eine bedeutungsvolle Pause und betrachtet den Marschall, der sich die Augenbrauen reibt.{/n} "... sich so oft als unüberwindbares Hindernis erweist."
languages.original_text: "Only the guilty try to defend themselves, whereas I acted in the interests of the Imperium. Such a shame that some things cannot be set right by bureaucratic means, and that the short-sightedness of certain people serving in adjacent divisions..." {n}She pauses meaningfully, watching the Marshal knit his brows.{/n} "...so often becomes an insurmountable obstacle."

traits.locale_text: "Nur die Schuldigen versuchen, sich zu verteidigen, während ich im Interesse des Imperiums gehandelt habe. Es ist ein Jammer, dass einige Dinge nicht mit bürokratischen Mitteln behoben werden können und dass die Kurzsichtigkeit gewisser Personen in anderen Abteilungen ..." {n}Sie macht eine bedeutungsvolle Pause und betrachtet den Marschall, der sich die Augenbrauen reibt.{/n} "... sich so oft als unüberwindbares Hindernis erweist."

languages.text: « Seuls les coupables cherchent à se défendre. Moi, j'ai agi dans l'intérêt de l'Imperium. Il est bien dommage que la bureaucratie ne puisse pas régler tous les problèmes et que le manque de discernement de certaines personnes servant des divisions adjacentes... » {n}Elle marque une pause lourde de sens en regardant le maréchal froncer les sourcils.{/n} « ... devienne si souvent un obstacle insurmontable. »
languages.original_text: "Only the guilty try to defend themselves, whereas I acted in the interests of the Imperium. Such a shame that some things cannot be set right by bureaucratic means, and that the short-sightedness of certain people serving in adjacent divisions..." {n}She pauses meaningfully, watching the Marshal knit his brows.{/n} "...so often becomes an insurmountable obstacle."

traits.locale_text: « Seuls les coupables cherchent à se défendre. Moi, j'ai agi dans l'intérêt de l'Imperium. Il est bien dommage que la bureaucratie ne puisse pas régler tous les problèmes et que le manque de discernement de certaines personnes servant des divisions adjacentes... » {n}Elle marque une pause lourde de sens en regardant le maréchal froncer les sourcils.{/n} « ... devienne si souvent un obstacle insurmontable. »

languages.text: “只有罪人才会试图辩护，而我所做的一切，都是为了帝国的利益。遗憾的是，某些问题无法通过官僚手段纠正，而其他部门的成员往往目光短浅……”{n}她意味深长地顿了顿，看着元帅皱着眉头的脸。{/n}“……而这往往会成为无法逾越的障碍。”
languages.original_text: "Only the guilty try to defend themselves, whereas I acted in the interests of the Imperium. Such a shame that some things cannot be set right by bureaucratic means, and that the short-sightedness of certain people serving in adjacent divisions..." {n}She pauses meaningfully, watching the Marshal knit his brows.{/n} "...so often becomes an insurmountable obstacle."

traits.locale_text: “只有罪人才会试图辩护，而我所做的一切，都是为了帝国的利益。遗憾的是，某些问题无法通过官僚手段纠正，而其他部门的成员往往目光短浅……”{n}她意味深长地顿了顿，看着元帅皱着眉头的脸。{/n}“……而这往往会成为无法逾越的障碍。”

languages.text: «Solo los culpables intentan defenderse. Yo actué para bien del Imperium. Es una lástima que la burocracia no pueda arreglarlo todo y que la cortedad de miras del personal de divisiones adyacentes...». {n}Hace una pausa cargada de significado mientras observa cómo el Mariscal frunce el ceño.{/n} «... a menudo se convierta en un obstáculo insalvable».
languages.original_text: "Only the guilty try to defend themselves, whereas I acted in the interests of the Imperium. Such a shame that some things cannot be set right by bureaucratic means, and that the short-sightedness of certain people serving in adjacent divisions..." {n}She pauses meaningfully, watching the Marshal knit his brows.{/n} "...so often becomes an insurmountable obstacle."

traits.locale_text: «Solo los culpables intentan defenderse. Yo actué para bien del Imperium. Es una lástima que la burocracia no pueda arreglarlo todo y que la cortedad de miras del personal de divisiones adyacentes...». {n}Hace una pausa cargada de significado mientras observa cómo el Mariscal frunce el ceño.{/n} «... a menudo se convierta en un obstáculo insalvable».

languages.text: 「罪を犯した者だけが自分を守ろうとするが、私は帝国の利益のために働いた。官僚主義的な手段では正せないこともあり、隣接する部署に仕えるある種の人々の近視眼的な考え方が…」{n}将帥が眉をひそめるのを見て、彼女は意味ありげに立ち止まった。{/n}「…乗り越えられない障害になることが多いのだ」
languages.original_text: "Only the guilty try to defend themselves, whereas I acted in the interests of the Imperium. Such a shame that some things cannot be set right by bureaucratic means, and that the short-sightedness of certain people serving in adjacent divisions..." {n}She pauses meaningfully, watching the Marshal knit his brows.{/n} "...so often becomes an insurmountable obstacle."

traits.locale_text: 「罪を犯した者だけが自分を守ろうとするが、私は帝国の利益のために働いた。官僚主義的な手段では正せないこともあり、隣接する部署に仕えるある種の人々の近視眼的な考え方が…」{n}将帥が眉をひそめるのを見て、彼女は意味ありげに立ち止まった。{/n}「…乗り越えられない障害になることが多いのだ」

languages.text: "Kendini savunmak için debelenenler yalnızca suçlulardır. Oysa ben, İmparatorluk'un çıkarları doğrultusunda hareket ettim. Ne yazık ki bazı şeyler bürokratik yollarla çözülemiyor ve komşu dairelerde görev yapan at gözlüklü bazı kişilerin bu tavrı..." {n}Miralay'ın kaşlarını çattığını görüyor ve manidar bir şekilde duraksıyor.{/n} "Çoğu zaman aşılmaz bir engele dönüşüyor."
languages.original_text: "Only the guilty try to defend themselves, whereas I acted in the interests of the Imperium. Such a shame that some things cannot be set right by bureaucratic means, and that the short-sightedness of certain people serving in adjacent divisions..." {n}She pauses meaningfully, watching the Marshal knit his brows.{/n} "...so often becomes an insurmountable obstacle."

traits.locale_text: "Kendini savunmak için debelenenler yalnızca suçlulardır. Oysa ben, İmparatorluk'un çıkarları doğrultusunda hareket ettim. Ne yazık ki bazı şeyler bürokratik yollarla çözülemiyor ve komşu dairelerde görev yapan at gözlüklü bazı kişilerin bu tavrı..." {n}Miralay'ın kaşlarını çattığını görüyor ve manidar bir şekilde duraksıyor.{/n} "...Çoğu zaman aşılmaz bir engele dönüşüyor."
